extendedInfo.description: Dream Diary is a private place for taking notes about Your dreams, thoughts and their possible meanings. It can be also a great tool for improving Your memory and keeping brain active. Dream Diary helps great if You want to recall important aspects needing interpretation, see recurrent patterns in dreams, and to improve Your dream recall altogether. Lastly, it should be fun exercise and one that helps You to make sense of Your inner world.Keeping dream diary requires some self-discipline, but when You are in a habit, it may be a long-term source of encouragement and interest.Features* Simple dark, night-adapted interface* Secured by passcode (optional), preventing from unauthorized access* Sort dreams by categories* Mark dreams in different colors* Search saved dreams* Import / export diaryRequired permissions to check internet connection and to access SD card.---devmys

reviews.title: Needs autosave and custom categories
reviews.comment: An almost perfect app, does what it\'s supposed to and is easy to use. The input really needs autosave functionality, since the text disappears for various reasons. Custom categories and colors should be an option. Finally, it would be neat if calendar view showed the dreams as multiple colored dots instead of just blue dots, and if list view had an option to just display titles, category and color for an overview of recent dreams. All in all though this is the best dream journal app I\'ve seen.
reviews.author: Wehan Coombs

reviews.title: All in all
reviews.comment: All in all this is a great and helpful app. There could some more categories and possibly having security question would make it easier if you forget your password rather then having to erase all your dreams written down and start again.
reviews.author: Zenda Weaver

reviews.title: great app!
reviews.comment: I think it is a great app it has different dream types and it is really easy to use I also love that I can keep my dreams private.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Excellent. Just wish it had more categories. E.g. places. My dreams never fit the few categories that are listed. But that\'s a minor quibble. Really easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Saving
reviews.comment: When my screen shuts off or I get a notification while writing my dream, it deletes everything I\'ve written since I last saved it. Auto save would be helpful and also the categories are weird.
reviews.author: Adrienne Cannon

reviews.title: Save template feature
reviews.comment: So I wrote two awesome long dreams this morning. When I was done I pressed back instead of save. Lost it all. Really fucked up my day.  The best feature you could add really would be something that saves the text while you\'re writing it. Great app otherwise! 10/10
reviews.author: Jeremi Morin

reviews.title: Does what it\'s supposed to, but needs autosave
reviews.comment: App covers the basics, but it desperately needs a draft/autosave feature. (I just had to type my dream in 3 times.)   Also I would like colour and category to be optional. I never use it anyway.
reviews.author: Diederik Hattingh

reviews.title: Update your app!
reviews.comment: Come on dev, read your users comments and fix the one thing everyone is having a problem with!
reviews.author: Tyler Allen

reviews.title: Best dream journal
reviews.comment: I tried many but really liked this one.
reviews.author: Ava Boggus

reviews.title: Epic!
reviews.comment: Best dream journal on the Android market if you ask me! I would like them to a section for tags or somthing. That would make the best app even cooler! ^^
reviews.author: leah boggs

reviews.title: Almost perfect.
reviews.comment: There is a critical feature that is missing. A list of all  the dreams. I want to see all the dreams that I wrote in this app.
reviews.author: Evgeni Khmelnitsky

reviews.title: Good idea but...
reviews.comment: I would definitely use this app if I could save my entries. Galaxy s4. Entries not being safed. Will try this app in a few months again till then 2 stars for good concept but buggy.
reviews.author: N Anderson

reviews.title: Super cool until you lose all your work
reviews.comment: Over the course of using this app, I\'ve probably lost an hours worth of writing. If I hit about anything just outside of my keyboard, the app just deletes everything. At least have it bring up a confirmation prompt. Also, after a month or two, it gets difficult to find anything because there\'s no decent way to show just a list of days with dreams .
reviews.author: Justin Trippler

reviews.title: Amazing app!
reviews.comment: I loved this app! it helped me improve my memory of my dreams so I had the more frequently (I\'m practicing for lucid dreaming) but I forgot my password and I know I had some seriously funny dreams on there. could there be a way to get those back?
reviews.author: Jessica Dooley

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Maybe it needs of some adjustments (for example for switching in the different pages in the calender) but works well without any problem ;)  Ty
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Easy and fun to thinking about dreams with this app.
reviews.author: Lukasz Stefanowicz

reviews.title: Mandatory title
reviews.comment: It\'s good but it annoys me that it\'s mandatory to write a title as some times I just want to quickly write a dream before I forget  and save it with the least effort
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: So fun to read about dreams ive had over the month, helps me remember them better aswell.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best app of the diary
reviews.comment: I love the whole thing Where there is a title and pick if it\'s a nightmare and I love it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: Its a good app, but it could use a few more categories. Also it would be nice to be able to see all your dreams listed together instead of monthly.
reviews.author: Hunter Grant
